name: Libanius-dev
tagline: A machine-corrected EpiDoc version of the works of the Greek rhetorician Libanius.
body:
#Welcome to libanius-dev!

##About
This repository hosts digital versions of copyright-free editions and translations of the works of Libanius, a Greek rhetorician.

These XML files were produced by data entry company [Digital Divide Data](http://www.digitaldividedata.org/) (DDD), who corrected and encoded hOCR output generated by [Bruce Robertson](https://github.com/brobertson?tab=activity) in accordance with the latest [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) standards. While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).

##Contents
* Libanii Opera, [Vol. 1.1](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/libanius-dev/blob/master/libanius_1_1.xml): _Orationes I-V_ (1903) Ed. Richard Förster. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* Libanii Opera, Vol. 1.2: _Orationes VI-XI_ (1903) Ed. Richard Förster. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* Libanii Opera, [Vol. 3](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/libanius-dev/blob/master/libanius_3.xml): _Orationes XXVI-L_ (1906) Ed. Richard Förster. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* Libanii Opera, [Vol. 4](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/libanius-dev/blob/master/libanius_4.xml): _Orationes LI-LXIV_ (1908) Ed. Richard Förster. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* Libanii Opera, [Vol. 5](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/libanius-dev/blob/master/libanius_5.xml): _Declamationes I-XII_ (1909) Ed. Richard Förster. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* Libanii Opera, [Vol. 6](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/libanius-dev/blob/master/libanius_6.xml): _Declamationes XIII-XXX_ (1911) Ed. Richard Förster. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* Libanii Opera, [Vol. 7](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/libanius-dev/blob/master/libanius_7.xml): _Declamationes XXXI-LI_ (1913) Ed. Richard Förster. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* Libanii Opera, Vol. 8: _Progymnasmata - Argumenta Orationum Demosthenicarum_ (1915) Ed. Richard Förster. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* Libanii Opera, [Vol. 9](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/libanius-dev/blob/master/libanius_9.xml): _Libanii qui feruntur characteres epistolici prolegomena ad epistulas_ (1963) Ed. Richard Förster. Hildesheim: Georg Olms Verlagsbuchhandlung.
* Libanii Opera, [Vol. 10](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/libanius-dev/blob/master/libanius_10.xml): _Epistulae 1-839_ (1963) Ed. Richard Förster. Hildesheim: Georg Olms Verlagsbuchhandlung.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
